ownedComment.body: class AutomatonInstance { public void consume() { PortInstance inPort = null; loop: for (PortInstance port: self.getPort()) { if (port.getClassifier().iterator().next().directionForComponent(self.getClassifier().iterator().next()) == Direction.IN) { inPort = port; break loop; } } // consume the signal SignalInstance signal = inPort.getSignal().get(0); inPort.getSignal().remove(0); // find the triggered transition for(Transition transition: getTrigger()) { if (transition.getInput().getType().equals(signal.getClassifier().iterator().next())) { // create and send all output signals for (Output out: transition.getOutput()) { PortInstance portInstance = null; // find via port instance for (PortInstance port: self.getPort()) { if (port.getClassifier().iterator().next().equals(out.getVia())) { portInstance = port; } } // create and send output signal SignalInstance outSignal = InstanceFactory.getFactory().createSignalInstance(out.getType()); portInstance.getSignal().add(outSignal); portInstance.send(); } } } } public ReflectiveCollection<? extends Transition> getTrigger() { ReflectiveCollection<Transition> result = new SetImpl<Transition>(); for(Transition transition: self.getClassifier().iterator().next().getTransition()) { if (transition.getSource().contains(getActualState())) { result.add(transition); } } return result; } } class PortInstance { public void send() { SignalInstance signal = self.getSignal().get(0); self.getSignal().remove(0); PortInstance opposite = getOpposite(); opposite.getSignal().add(signal); if (opposite.getComponent() instanceof AutomatonInstance) { ((AutomatonInstance)opposite.getComponent()).consume(); } } public PortInstance getOpposite() { return self.getClassifier().iterator().next().getChannel().getTarget().iterator().next().getImplicitInstance(); } }

class Port { public Direction directionForComponent(Component component) { if (getDirection() == Direction.IN) { if (component instanceof System) { return Direction.IN; } else { return Direction.OUT; } } else { if (component instanceof System) { return Direction.OUT; } else { return Direction.IN; } } } }
